effect.scarlet-violet: Inflicts regular damage. User takes 1/3 the damage it inflicts in recoil.
effect.the-teal-mask: Inflicts regular damage. User takes 1/3 the damage it inflicts in recoil.
effect.the-indigo-disk: Inflicts regular damage. User takes 1/3 the damage it inflicts in recoil.

short_effect.scarlet-violet: User receives 1/3 the damage inflicted in recoil.
short_effect.the-teal-mask: User receives 1/3 the damage inflicted in recoil.
short_effect.the-indigo-disk: User receives 1/3 the damage inflicted in recoil.

flavor_text.scarlet-violet: A reckless life-risking tackle in which the user rushes the target. This also damages the user quite a lot.
